V3 loop of human immunodeficiency virus type 1 suppresses interleukin 2 - induced T cell growth [ published erratum appears in AIDS Res Hum Retroviruses 1997 May 1 ; 13 ( 7 ) : 633 ]

We tested the effect of three linear or two loop peptides derived from the V3 region of the HTLV-III BH10 clone or the SF2 strain of human immunodeficiency virus type 1 on <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - driven T cell proliferation .

We tested the effect of three linear or two loop peptides derived from the V3 region of the HTLV-III BH10 clone or the SF2 strain of human immunodeficiency virus type 1 on IL-2 - driven T cell proliferation .

V3-BH10 , which consists of 42 amino acids and has a loop structure , suppressed <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - driven proliferation of all <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - dependent cells [ Kit225 , ED-40515 ( + ) , KT-3 , 7-day PHA-blasts , and fresh peripheral blood mononuclear cells ] tested , whereas it did not suppress the cell growth of <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - independent cell lines ( Hut102 , Molt-4 , and Jurkat ) .

V3-BH10 , which consists of 42 amino acids and has a loop structure , suppressed IL-2 - driven proliferation of all IL-2 - dependent cells [ Kit225 , ED-40515 ( + ) , KT-3 , 7-day PHA-blasts , and fresh peripheral blood mononuclear cells ] tested , whereas it did not suppress the cell growth of IL-2 - independent cell lines ( Hut102 , Molt-4 , and Jurkat ) .

This suppressive effect was also seen in <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - driven cell growth of CD8 - positive lymphocytes purified from 7-day PHA-blasts , indicating that <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> molecules were not required for the suppression .
This suppressive effect was also seen in IL-2 - driven cell growth of CD8 - positive lymphocytes purified from 7-day PHA-blasts , indicating that CD4 molecules were not required for the suppression .
The treatment with anti-V3 loop monoclonal antibody ( 902 antibody ) completely abolished the suppressive effect of V3-BH10 .
The treatment with anti-V3 loop monoclonal antibody ( 902 antibody ) completely abolished the suppressive effect of V3-BH10 .
In addition , V3-BH10 generated the arrest of Kit225 cells and also purified CD8 - positive lymphocytes in G1 phase in the presence of <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
In addition , V3-BH10 generated the arrest of Kit225 cells and also purified CD8 - positive lymphocytes in G1 phase in the presence of IL-2 .
Neither chromatin condensation nor DNA fragmentation was detected in Kit225 cells cultured with V3-BH10 and <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Neither chromatin condensation nor DNA fragmentation was detected in Kit225 cells cultured with V3-BH10 and IL-2 .
